Hymn.Arabic: 11 - نور قد زرع للصديق و فرح للمستقيمي القلب.
Hymn.English: 11 Light is sown for the righteous, And gladness for the upright in heart.

Hymn.Arabic: 12- افرحوا ايها الصديقون بالرب و احمدوا ذكر قدسه "
Hymn.English: 12 Rejoice in the Lord, you righteous, And give thanks at the remembrance of His holy name.     Alleluia
